local_intent: Ensure the T-block is perceived, align to it within 0.01 tolerance, set TCP yaw to 90°, then verify pose at the block.
assumptions: Using IsAt(t_block) as a proxy to verify successful approach/alignment before pushing.
coherence_with_global: Matches GLOBAL_BT sequence: detect t_block → ApproachAndAlign(t_block, 0.01, 1200) → SetTCPYaw(90) and prepares for subsequent push while verifying pose.
